hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT facilitator.ID facilitator_id,facilitator.NAME facilitator_name,facilitator.INN facilitator_inn FROM SERVICE_PROVIDERS facilitator WHERE ((:extra_name IS NULL) OR (:extra_name = '') OR (upper(facilitator.NAME) LIKE upper(:extra_like_name))) AND ((:extra_inn IS NULL) OR (:extra_inn = '') OR (upper(facilitator.INN) LIKE upper(:extra_like_inn))) AND facilitator.IS_FASILITATOR = '1'
